Vollodos:
If you want to become a Dark Knight, contact Master Virgil in Gludio.
If you want to become an Assassin, go to Triskel in Gludio.
If you want to become a Dark Magician, go to the Ceremonial Altar and find the Witch Varik.
If you want to become the Shilen Oracle, go to Magister Sidra in Gludio.
